law.catch_line: Governmental entities exempt from fee requirements.
law.text:
Subsection (1) of KRS 329.030, subsections (1) and (3) of KRS 329.040 and subsection
of KRS 329.050, relating to fees charged applicants for a license, shall not apply to any department of the United States or any agency of the city, county or state, provided that no fee is charged for administration of the test.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 44, sec. 6, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 18.
